website_summaries.verdict: You'll be hard pressed to find a tool that this set doesn't have. The heavy-duty nylon bag is sturdy and makes it easy to carry all the tools.
pros: All tools are vanadium-steel with comfort grips
Lots of owners love it not just around the home but also on camp trips and small auto repairs
cons: Some complaints that the metal is too soft
Some wish the bag was more organized

customer_reviews.title: Using on my boat
customer_reviews.text: I always like to have a tool kit on the boat. This is a good tool kit for the boat. The tools are high quality and are complete enough. The only thing that I wish this kit had was box wrenches. Also the small torx bits will not stay in the plastic container. I recommend that you dump them all out into a zip lock bag.
customer_reviews.author: Connor McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by the quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised to the fact that the tools were much better than I was expecting. You know the drill cheap tools and so on but not these. They were selling at a good price for the different tools sets they sell. I add a wrench and pliers set to the bag deal. The picture is everything in the bag. Tough bag well forged tools but most of all they feel good in the hand. All of them. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: ScadaRick

customer_reviews.title: Great quality much better then expected
customer_reviews.text: The tool set blew me away the quality was much better then I was expecting. The bag alone is worth 50 bucks. This set exceeded was I was expecting I have opened and started using in the same day and wow. I 200% recommend this product for any level with it be for around the house or handy man which is what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Brister

customer_reviews.title: Good low use set.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. I bought this to throw in my motorhome. It’s a set I can easily afford and not have to lug back and forth to my garage. The quality is a little lacking (I’ll be replacing the adjustable wrench) but for my application it’s perfect. I wouldn’t recommend this set for the every day use, but it’s handy have.
customer_reviews.author: Vonbaronmattso

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality and variety, basic set of homeowner tools
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mom, who just moved into a new place and had almost no tools. Love the number of sockets that came with this, and they appear to be good quality. Many of the pieces are just "throw in" pieces to be able to claim a higher qty of pieces, so you're getting nowhere near 322 tools, sockets, and screwdriver bits, but it covers a broad range of basic needs - more than my mom will need in most cases, which is what I was going for.
customer_reviews.author: Sanslucid

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for general household use
customer_reviews.text: So far I love these tools, they have the look and feel of much more expensive tools without the price. I love the tote they come in which provides enough space for me to consolidate a handful of other hand tools that I have had laying around.
customer_reviews.author: Father Silouan

customer_reviews.title: The Tools Are Great Even If the Bag Is Not
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for the collection of tools and am very impressed with the quality. They work great and I've already used them for several projects without any hassle. The only negative is that one of the handles of the back came partially apart at the seam. I sewed it back up and haven't had any issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: john solberg

customer_reviews.title: solid tools
customer_reviews.text: bought these for our on site tool kits, and they have been pretty well abused so far, with only a couple of the presicion screw driver getting broken, for the price and what they were put through, this is a great kit!
customer_reviews.author: Derrek

customer_reviews.title: Lots of sturdy tools for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Lots of sturdy tools for a great price. This is a perfect kit for keeping in the RV for those needed repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Get The Red and Blue with Rubberized Handles
customer_reviews.text: The new one's with the red and blue rubber coated handles are outstanding, in quaulity and comfort. The older one's, big sigh, not so good quality. Try to get the rubberized handled tools, they're much much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: he is super happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my dad, he is super happy with it. It might not be a well known brand but it's of good quality. He has been showing it off since he got it, now my husband is upset cause I didn't get him one. I will definitely recommend you buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tools!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tools And tool bag it’s amazing. Perfect for starting my career as maintenance mechanic! Great tool for a starter Thank you WORKPRO!
customer_reviews.author: Saul I.

customer_reviews.title: For the price you cant go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this set. The only complaint that i really have is that there is no basic pliers, but i knew this when i bought it. All the tools seem to be pretty well made. I havent used them all yet but feel they will most likely hold up to some of my abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy soft bag but its going to be a pain in the ass to find tools in another month or 2 of use.
customer_reviews.text: Needs drivers for drill to run drives. plastic things that hold driver bits break off easily. cases that hold small drivers suck and bits fall out all over the place. crescent wrenches are nice.
customer_reviews.author: 200mfromocean

customer_reviews.title: Durability and convience
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The tools are holding up since I first bought them a month ago. I dont out them through too much abuse. The bag could use more compartments to help with organizing the tools better. But you get what you pay for and only you know the tools you'll need to get the job done. It's no Craftsman or husky, youd have to buy those separately. So far. This is an alright buy.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality of the tool bag. I’m using some canvas tool pouches since the pockets are a bit shallow for some tools. This is used in conjunction with property management and maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Almost everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Great tool kit to through in the trunk to have for emergencies. I added a set of ratcheting wrenches to complete the setup
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver as a new homeowner. It seems any tool I need has been on hand with this set. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight_E

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tool kit to have on my RV. I think I all in all it is a decent kit I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ronnief

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool kit
customer_reviews.text: These aren't snap-on quality but it's a comprehensive kit for most homes / sheds and campers.
customer_reviews.author: Len H

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It s heavy to carry. It is a good assortment of metric and US. I like it a great deal
customer_reviews.author: Dr H, RN

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting cheap quality tool set. To my surprise they were quite the opposite. Great value and quality for the money and the best part is the bag. It's heavy duty and plenty of room for additional tools. Overall very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great all in one tool set.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tool set to equip my motorhome. The tools are decent quality, the selection is everything you'll need for most tasks around the house. It's a good value for its cost.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Definetly love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and a great value! I am really pleased with the quality and service of the seller. I will definetly do business with this seller again and I recommend them to anyone. Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Jason W. Matick

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: She loves it. Bought it for my daughter in-law and she loves the set. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Swingsimtech

customer_reviews.title: "Super Value For Tool System"
customer_reviews.text: I Was Not Aware Of The Quality Of This Product Once I Had Received It, No Question This Was A Great Investment So I Am Very Pleased With My Set's And Quantity That It Came With To Better Service My Needs In A Tool Set... DS
customer_reviews.author: DES-SRT-8

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband and he gets a ton of use out of it
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey, but most usable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter she loves it to fix dorm room stuff
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The box cutter won't close with a blade in it. It only closes without the blade.
customer_reviews.author: anita hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great for an on the go tool kit or new home owner. I keep mine in my semi tractor and use it all the time when I’m not on the road I move it to my pickup. Tools aren’t the highest quality but definitely better than the cost.
customer_reviews.author: matthew martin

customer_reviews.title: Great tool set
customer_reviews.text: Bought these tool for my sister, she loved them and used them every day
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda Serna

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit for average around the house use. Comes with everything the weekend handy wo/man would need... and at a reasonable price. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Dad

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: Lots of tools for the price. I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very complete
customer_reviews.text: We returned it because the person we purchased it for, is no longer able to use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for the first time home owner or beginning do it yourself type
customer_reviews.author: Richard Woods

customer_reviews.title: Beat Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my honey and he was super impressed with the variety of tools in this set! I just loved the bag bc it allows for easy storage!!
customer_reviews.author: Ari Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the quality. Very similar to the 230 piece Kobalt kit that I have for $80 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Contains most of everything you need for simple jobs
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit - got this to keep on the boat for some simple jobs, and it gets the job done! Great quality for the money - can be tough to keep organized in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tools, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are great tools for the price. Almost everything you need for simple projects.
customer_reviews.author: alec wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tools for my brother. And he said I have everything I need right thanks sis 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a starter kit for my son for Christmas. As a pro who uses tools all day, every day the tools seem to be if great quality for the price. I expect them to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: M Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: handy man.
customer_reviews.text: ever since i took delivery of the tool kit, i have been fixing stuff around the house and car. perfect for a hobbyist like me.
customer_reviews.author: isinibo j.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Son and Son in law. They really enjoy the tools
customer_reviews.author: Mark Logan

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made but wish compartments inside bag were adjustable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Essential tools
customer_reviews.text: Loved how every item that was displayed online was individually wrapped. Tools are very sturdy and well insulated. No issues at all
customer_reviews.author: Tristian Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great tool kit for daily task
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool kit and the tolls are really good quality. the kit comes complete with most tools you will need for daily task. I highly recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Williamson

customer_reviews.title: You have my rating!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product I Despise that you force me to answer the rest of this crap. BE SATISFIED WITH THE RATING!
customer_reviews.author: Extremely Exigent!

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good for price would love to know how durable they are but for the moment getting the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Molina

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Very satisfied🥰
customer_reviews.text: Brought as gift, Very satisfied with quality, packaging, modern look!
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Deluxxe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tool set. If you are looking to get into technical work this is great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Rowland-Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great kit! Already came in handy fixing a 4wheeler ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kit! Already came in handy fixing a 4wheeler while out camping. Only downside is that there are too many tools to keep any sort of order in there, just a big pile of mixed tools, but I'm not going to complain about too many tools :)
customer_reviews.author: BroxigarTheRed

customer_reviews.title: Great starter pack for newlywed
customer_reviews.text: Added a set of wrenches and all set for light daily needs.
customer_reviews.author: Backpack NC

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice collection but the metal is too soft for any ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very lacking. The screwdrivers were losing there edges after minimal use. It's a nice collection but the metal is too soft for any reasonable use.
customer_reviews.author: Salman S.

customer_reviews.title: Really Decent Basic Tool Set for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to take to college so he’d have a decent basic tool set on-hand. It’s surprisingly good quality for the price. The bag is very sturdy and there is room to add additional tools, supplies or accessories. I mean, this isn’t a set of tools that’s going to last a lifetime or is made to survive the NASCAR circuit, (and I don’t think they claim such) but it’s a really great basic set and can cover most do-it-yourselfer needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K

product_meta.title: WORKPRO W009037A 322-Piece Home Repair Hand Tool Kit Basic Household Tool Set with Carrying Bag
product_meta.description: This tool set includes: 8PC metric hex key, 9PC SAE hex key6PC screwdriver: SLT1/4"x1-1/2", SLT1/4"x4", SLT3/16"x3", PH1X3", PH2X4", PH2X1-1/2" 7PC precision screwdriver: 1/16", 5/64", 3/32", 1/8", PH000, PH00, PH01PC 6" long nose pliers, 1PC 7" Combination pliers, 1PC 6"Diagonal pliers, 1PC 8"CRV adjustable wrench1PC 8" stripper. 1PC 16OZ Claw hammer, 1PC 7. 5M（25FT）Tape measure, 1PC 9"torpedo level, 1PC utility knife20PC SK5 blades with dispenser, 1PC brush, 1PC insulated tape, 40pc cable ties, 1PC 8-1/2"scissors, 85PC hardware kits, 1PC magnetic screwdriver holder, 40PC CRV bits, 12PC nuts, 1PC 1/4"ratchet handle, 1PC 1/4"DR extension, 1PC 3/8"ratchet handle, 1PC 3/8"x3"extension, 1PC 3/8"x6"extension1PC 3/8"X1/4"adaptor, 8PC 1/4"standard metric sockets, 6pt10PC 1/4"deep metric sockets, 6pt8PC 1/4"standard SAE sockets, 6pt10PC 1/4" deep SAE sockets, 6pt10PC 3/8"standard metric sockets, 12pt11PC 3/8"deep metric sockets, 6pt9PC 3/8"deep SAE sockets, 6pt9PC 3/8"standard SAE sockets, 12pt1PC 1/4"DR spinner handle1PC 18" tool bag.
feature_bullets: 322-Piece basic tool kit for everyday chores and repairs
Chrome vanadium steel tools with heat treated for strength and durability
Packed in 18" Durable nylon bag for easy and flexible storage
Includes hammer, level, tape measure, utility knife, pliers, screw drivers, hex wrenches, cables ties, socket sets
All tools meet or exceed ANSI critical standards

specifications.Included Components: Hex key^screwdriver^precision screwdriver^pliers^adjustable wrench^stripper^hammer^Tape measure^torpedo level^utility knife^blades^brush^insulated tape^cable ties^scissors^hardware kits^ratchet handle^sockets^tool bag
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars245 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
